import React , { Component } from 'react' class ServiceDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ amt: 0, serPer: '0.1', cName: '', tipVal: 0, tipCal: 0, custDetails: '', totalTip: 0, custCount: 0 } } ChangeAmt = (event) => {this.setState({amt: event.target.value})} ; ChangeSerPer = (event) => {this.setState({serPer: event.target.value})} ; ChangeCName = (event) => {this.setState({cName: event.target.value})} ; TipCal = (event) => { this.setState({tipCal: this.state.amt * this.state.serPer }) this.setState({custDetails: this.state.custDetails + this.state.cName}) this.setState({custCount: this.state.custCount + 1}) }; OnAdd = (event) => {event.prevent.default()}; render () { const {amt , serPer , cName , tipCal , custDetails , totalTip , custCount } = this.state return (
Enter your bill amount Rs.

How was the service ? { this.TipCal() }} />

Tip Amount :Rs

Customer List
  • {this.state.cName} offered a tip of {this.state.tipCal} Rupees
Total number of customers: Total tip Amount :Rs
) } } export default ServiceDetails;
